subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: In a 6-0 loss to Canada’s World Baseball Classic team, Joba Chamberlain failed to record an out in the first inning, allowing four walks, a wild pitch, a hit and five runs.
snippet: In a 6-0 loss to Canada’s World Baseball Classic team, Joba Chamberlain failed to record an out in the first inning, allowing four walks, a wild pitch, a hit and five runs.
